level.heading: Ramps.
level.text: ยง 27-308 Ramps.--(a) When a building erected prior to December sixth, nineteen hundred sixty-nine is altered to provide access to individuals who use wheelchairs, ramps constructed to provide such access may, with the approval of the commissioner, project beyond the street line for a distance of not more than forty-four inches. (b) Ramps shall comply with the applicable provisions of reference standard RS 4-6.
